name: Car Key Replacement
title: Mobile replacement keys cut & programmed at your location.
subtitle: Fast on-site help for lost or broken keys.
description: mySMI.uk provides fast mobile car key replacement. We come to you, cut and program a new key where possible, and get you back on the road with less stress and fair pricing.
metaDescription: Fast mobile car key replacement. We come to you, cut and program a new key where possible, and get you back on the road with less stress and fair pricing.
metaKeywords: car key replacement, mobile auto locksmith, lost car keys, replacement car key, key cutting, key programming

name: Car Unlocking
title: Safe, non-destructive entry to get you back inside fast.
subtitle: Quick lockout assistance with minimal risk of damage.
description: Locked your keys inside or can’t open the door? Our mobile auto locksmith can help you regain access using safe, non-destructive methods where possible.
metaDescription: Locked your keys inside or can’t open the door? Our mobile auto locksmith helps you regain access using safe, non-destructive methods where possible.
metaKeywords: car unlocking, locked out of car, auto locksmith, non-destructive entry, vehicle lockout service, mobile locksmith

name: Spare Car Keys
title: Spare keys and remotes supplied and programmed on-site.
subtitle: Get a spare key ready before you need it.
description: A spare key saves time and money later. We supply and program spare car keys and remote fobs for many makes and models, at your location.
metaDescription: We supply and program spare car keys and remote fobs for many makes and models, at your location—helping you avoid future emergencies.
metaKeywords: spare car keys, spare key, remote fob programming, car key duplication, auto locksmith, mobile service

name: Ignition Barrel Replacement
title: On-site diagnosis and repair/replacement for stuck ignitions.
subtitle: Repair or replace ignition parts at your location.
description: If your ignition barrel is damaged or stuck, we can diagnose the problem and repair or replace ignition components on-site to get you moving again.
metaDescription: If your ignition barrel is damaged or stuck, we diagnose the problem and repair or replace ignition components on-site to get you moving again.
metaKeywords: ignition barrel replacement, ignition repair, key won't turn, ignition jammed, auto locksmith, mobile locksmith

name: Car Key Programming
title: Transponder and remote programming so your key works correctly.
subtitle: Make sure your key starts the car and the remote works.
description: We program transponder chips and remote keys so your vehicle recognises the key and the buttons work correctly. Mobile service available for many vehicles.
metaDescription: On-site car key programming for transponder chips and remote keys so your vehicle recognises the key and the buttons work correctly.
metaKeywords: car key programming, transponder programming, remote key programming, key fob programming, auto locksmith, mobile service

name: Car Key Repair
title: Fix broken casings and worn buttons without full replacement.
subtitle: Restore everyday use without a full new key.
description: If your key casing is broken or buttons are failing, we may be able to repair your key and restore functionality without a full replacement.
metaDescription: If your key casing is broken or buttons are failing, we may be able to repair your car key and restore functionality without a full replacement.
metaKeywords: car key repair, key fob repair, broken car key, key casing repair, buttons not working, auto locksmith
